attributes.action: Allow makeup artists & beauty techs to return to work definitely on the 15/8/20
attributes.additional_details: While pubs restaurants and hair salons have had the go ahead to re open, 3 environments where cross contamination and non social distancing are highly likely, as we have seen for ourselves in recent headlines. Our industry should be allowed to re open under stricter PPE guidance to ADD to our already extremely sanitary expectations, in comparison to the hair and retail industry who’s guidance has only been to wear a mask.
attributes.background: Confirm that August 15th is a for DEFINITE date that makeup artists, beautytechs and eyebrow technicians can return to work as people in the industry are beginning to become financially stressed and businesses are at risk of closing if the government continues to make “last minute” decision changes.
